author1Quote: If you die, you can't regret. So do all the things before you can't regret.
author2Quote: The first step to getting what you want is having the courage to get rid of what you don't
author3Quote: I plan every step of my life and sometimes it wasn't a wonderful way. Keep in mind, it's always worth to do.
author4Quote: There are two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle
introductionSectionTitle: <0>WE ARE COBDA,<1/>THE PLACE WHERE BUYER AND SELLER MEETS.</0>
introductionSectionDescription: A streetwear e-commerce website where sellers and buyers meet each other with ease, driven by our desire to make community alike websites available for every gender and generation. Make certain with a powerful autonomous function that automatically takes out inappropriate content to make sure your vibe goes as smoothly as possible. Buy with confidence guaranteed by other customers.
goalSectionDescription: <0>We, young passionate students from Kasetsart University, have an idea to create an ecommerce web application where people who love streetwears are able to trade their items freely without any commission fee. Speaking of history, we(authors) all have had a rough experience in trading a goods. With this, it driven us to find a solution as a result of <1>Cobda</1> where you're currently experiencing. We aim to reduce actions taken to either sell or buy so as to reduce fake account users with the power of AI. The AI will be the person who validates content in this website. For example, media content, text content, profile picture, etc. We hope Cobda will ease up your trading experience. We, the <1>Cobda</1> developers, deeply express our gratitude.</0>
